import React, { useContext } from "react"; import ApplicantContext from "../context/ApplicantContext"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import trllogo from "../images/trllogo.png"; import { useUser } from "../context/UserContext"; const Header = () => { const { isStaff } = useUser(); const { userinformation } = useContext(ApplicantContext); return (
  • Home
  • Jobs
    • {userinformation.access_token ? ( <> Profile ) : ( <> | Login to view your profile | )}
{userinformation.access_token ? ( <> Hello {userinformation.username} Logout ) : ( <>
Login{" "} | Register{" "}
)} isStaff: {isStaff.toString()}
); }; export default Header;
